title: Ion Maiden Preview Campaign Playthrough
description: Super excited for this game! A brand new build engine game in 2018 is just wonderful. I'll absolutely be playing this again when the game fully comes out, likely both any% and 100%. I'm just so happy that a game like this exists.

no engine is fundamentally bad lol -___-
Unity's problem is that it has a VERY low learning curve
DUSK - Unity engine used right, STRAFE - Unity engine used wrong
So literally anyone can pick it up and whip out something that claims to be a "game" in a week
unity also has feculent ass for audio capabilities
did they choose to make dusk as ugly as it is or could it have been much prettier on unity?

but I have sold my soul to godot

yes the devs tried to make DUSK look as much 1996 as possible. They've said that it was kinda hard because Unity always made the game look more modern than they wanted.

and gdscript is largely based on python which is great because that's the only programming language I'm really familiar with lol

if you want a level designer, someone will probably just have that shit in their google drive for you lol
